title: 11/22/21 DPS Hour 2
itunes:title: 11/22/21 DPS Hour 2
description:
Dan talks about whether LeBron James should be suspended for his part in the scuffle against the Detroit Pistons. Dan says Isaiah Stewart from the Pistons should be suspended at least 3 games because he tried to escalate the situation.
